description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.mGD4IPKZN4ruO73T]{Evolutionary Focus}

You wield your adaptive strike intuitively, raining blows upon your enemies.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.SD7998OEKJe5cJU7]{Basic}: When making a full attack you take a –3 penalty to attacks made with your adaptive strike instead of the normal –4 penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.sa0ffr80j4FIXRb6]{Advanced (13th Level)}: When making a full attack entirely with your adaptive strike, you can make three attacks instead of two attacks. You take a –5 penalty to these attacks instead of a –3 penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.KR4YcDKBvV0hWbcH]{Ultimate (19th Level)}: Once per round when you make a full attack and hit the same target at least twice with your adaptive strike, you can exaggerate the target’s wounds (such as by rending them, creating a deadly current, or triggering secondary explosions), dealing 5d10 additional damage (Fortitude half).
